prompt_base: raw photo, close up portrait of a weathered warrior, (reddish-brown sun-damaged skin:1.2), messy spiky black hair, fierce gaze
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, source palette preservation, identical color matching, realistic sweat, extreme muscle definition, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, mannequin, cgi, 3d render, airbrushed, low quality, friendly, neon red, saturated pink
